title: Item Lore Stats问题，请进来看看
txt_content: 如何把图片里的东西关掉

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
打开ils
打开config
找到
messages:
#信息提示
  loreSuccessfullyAdded: true
添加描述成功
  upgradeSuccessful: false
插件更新成功
  upgradeCapReached: false
插件有新版本
  itemReceived: true
收到ILS物品
  itemLooted: true
收到怪物掉落的ILS物品
vanilla:
#基础信息
  includeDamage: true
  includeArmour: false
combatMessages:
#战斗信息
  outgoing:
#输出伤害
    damageDone: true
    enemyDodgedAttack: true
    enemyBlockedAttack: true
    critStrike: true
    lifeSteal: true
    enemyReflectedAttack: true
    fire: true
    ice: true
    poison: true
    wither: true
    harm: true
    blind: true
  incoming:
  #受到伤害
    damageTaken: false
    dodgeAttack: true
    blockAttack: true
    enemyCritStrike: false
    enemyLifeSteal: true
    reflectAttack: true
    enemyFire: true
    enemyIce: true
    enemyPoison: true
    enemyWither: true
    enemyHarm: true
    enemyBlind: true

全部把true设置为false即可

求最佳
